name: Nugit Pte Ltd.
description: Operator of a data analytics platform designed to offer data storytelling for digital marketing. The company's platform combines artificial intelligence, natural language generation, and visualizations in order to transform data into decision-ready reports which flow straight back into the workflow, enabling clients to create up-sell opportunities with automated and evocative data stories.
one_liner: Operator of a data analytics platform designed to offer data storytelling for digital marketing. The company's platform combines artificial intelligence, natural language generation, and visualizations in order to transform data into decision-ready reports which flow straight back into the workflow, enabling clients to create up-sell opportunities with automated and evocative data stories.
